Rulings.Base:
1. You cannot activate this card or its effect during the Damage Step.
2. You can activate this card and its effect in the same Chain Link.
3. Tributing 1 face-up EARTH monster is a cost.
4. This effect targets up to 2 cards in the opponent's GY.
5. If only 1 of the targets is still in the GY when this effect resolves, you still remove it from play.
